headline: PPG highlights continued progress toward 2030 sustainability targets in latest report
summary: PITTSBURGH, May 22, 2025--PPG (NYSE:PPG) today announced continued progress against its near-term 2030 sustainability targets, including reducing greenhouse gas (GHG) emissions throughout its own operations and value chain, and continued improvement in sustainably advantaged product sales driven by customer demand.
